column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Looking for a better place? Try Beatrix at W Fulton Market. Really awesome food and the service was unlike anything I've experience before. Our friendly waitress knew it was my first time and walked us through the menu
column2: answered all our questions. She was genuine and sweet. Â And even
column3: even gave a rainbow toast on the house. First impressions mean everything
column4: ever since then I've come back multiple times. You can't go wrong w Beatrix.
